title: Gates of Olympus
spinInfo: Coba 30–50x spin manual sebelum beli fitur.
scatterTips: Beli scatter saat simbol petir sering muncul.

title: Starlight Princess
spinInfo: Gunakan turbo 10x lalu amati pola scatter.
scatterTips: Jangan beli scatter jika belum muncul bintang 2x berturut.

title: Sweet Bonanza
spinInfo: Spin 20x, lanjut auto 10x, lalu beli jika banyak bom muncul.
scatterTips: Tunggu pola 2x simbol scatter muncul bersamaan.
